AddNpcText.description: Displays dialog text from an NPC in the quest dialog window.

AddNpcInput.description: Adds a clickable link option in the dialog window. Use with InputNpc() rule.

AddNpcChat.description: Displays an NPC chat balloon (random chance) during the quest state.

AddNpcPM.description: Displays a private message in the dialog window with a custom name.

Roll.description: Performs a random roll of x.

GiveItem.description: Rewards the player with an item added to their inventory.

RemoveItem.description: Removes an item from the player's inventory.

GiveExp.description: Rewards the player with experience points.

ShowHint.description: Displays a hint message in the client's information bar.

PlaySound.description: Plays a sound effect for the player.

SetCoord.description: Teleports the player to the specified map coordinates.

Quake.description: Creates an earthquake effect on the specified map or the player's current map.

QuakeWorld.description: Creates an earthquake effect for all player's server wide.

SetClass.description: Changes the player's class to the specified class ID.

SetRace.description: Changes the player's race to the specified race ID.

GiveKarma.description: Awards karma points to the player.

RemoveKarma.description: Removes karma points from the player.

StartQuest.description: Starts another quest if not already active.

SetQuestState.description: Sets the quest state of an active quest.

GiveStat.description: Gives a stat to the player: STR, CON, level, admin, karma, class, gender, etc..

RemoveStat.description: Removes a stat from a player: STR, CON, level, admin, karma, class, gender, etc..

ResetDaily.description: Resets a quest for the day.

Reset.description: Resets the quest back to the Begin state, allowing it to be repeated.

End.description: Ends the quest permanently. The quest will display in the player's quest history as completed.
